text: Hello, I'm working on a module that needs to pull through 3 posts at a time. I've added the blog field (`blog`) to the module and I'm looping through with a conditional statement to only loop through 3 but there seems to only be 1 item in `<http://module.blog|module.blog>` so I'm just wondering how this is meant to be done. Thanks!

I believe youâ€™re looking for this function
`{{ blog_recent_posts("default", 5) }}`

Replace with `{{ blog_recent_posts(<http://module.blog|module.blog>, 3) }}`

Greetings, I'm working on a programmable email module that uses the Deal object type.
After publishing the module and adding it to my email template I see the following error.
```There was a problem loading your CRM object field
The CRM object type "deal" is restricted in public content. Please make this content private or contact the module creator.```
Does this mean I can't use the Deal object type in a programmable email module or is there something I can do to allow deals in public content?
Also, I'm very new to HubSpot. Is there somewhere to view more detailed logs?
